description: Isle of Man consultant urologist Peter Duffy and Health Minister David Ashford are awarded the MBE.
title: Birthday Honours 2020: Surgeon who comforted dying patients becomes MBE
title_page: Birthday Honours 2020: Surgeon who comforted dying patients becomes MBE - BBC News
maintext: After reading about a teenager in England whose parents could not be by his side when he died because of the pandemic, he said he was determined he would "not leave somebody to die on their own on the Isle of Man".
